https://openminds.om-i.org/props/customP.name: customPropertySet

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip._instruction: Enter a description of this activity.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.name: description

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device._instruction: Add the MRI machine setting used for this scan.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.name: device

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endTime._instruction: Enter the date and/or time on when this activity ended, formatted as either '2023-02-07T16:00:00+00:00' (date-time) or '16:00:00+00:00' (time).

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endTime.name: endTime

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fieldMa.label: Field map
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fieldMa.name: fieldMap

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input._instruction: Add the state of the subject or tissue sample before this session.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input.label: Input
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input.name: input

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO._instruction: Add the dataset version in which this activity was conducted.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO._instruction: Enter number of volumes discarded by user before the first volume.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO.name: numberOfVolumesDiscardedByUser

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/output._instruction: Add all outputs generated by this activity.
